title: Suspension of Aeroflot flights will be a devastating blow to Sri Lanka’s tourism industry; Sirisena writes to Putin
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Sri Lankan President Maithripala Sirisena says that the suspension of Aeroflot flights to Sri Lanka will be a devastating blow to the tourism of Sri Lanka, that is only just recovering from the Easter Attacks and COVID-19.

In a letter to Russian President Vladimir Putin, Sirisena said though he is no longer a member of the government in power, it is his obligation to the people to appeal to the Russian President and Government to treat this issue as a wholly judicial matter and not at all as a decision taken by the State.
He also said that Sri Lanka will need all the help and support from her trusted friends, and the help of Russia will be critical.
